data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Do you think that it is important for people to dress well? Provide reasons to support your opinion.
data.answer: In my opinion, dressing beautifully is of great importance in people's daily life. First of all, to have a decent outlook shows one person's respect toward others. Secondly, when people are dressing nicely, they tend to feel more confident, especially in a formal event. Besides, dressing well helps both the person himself and the people around him feel happier, and a great mood will, in turn, facilitate the efficiency of work and contribute to forging the bond between people.（79 字）
